name: jfa-go
description: jfa-go is a user management app for Jellyfin (and Emby as 2nd class) that provides invite-based account creation as well as other features that make one's instance much easier to manage.
longDescription: jfa-go is a user management app for Jellyfin (and Emby as 2nd class) that provides invite-based account creation as well as other features that make one's instance much easier to manage.
